title: City Ambience Vol.4
description: "City Ambience Vol.4" is a loop sounds from city infrastructure, including passing traffic during the day, helicopters flying over the city, as well as ambulance and fire engine sirens.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO

"City Ambience Vol.4" is a loop sounds from city infrastructure, including passing traffic during the day, helicopters flying over the city, as well as ambulance and fire engine sirens.

In addition, there are 9 loops recorded after the rain, in which you can hear the movement of city transport through puddles and the sound of raindrops falling on the windowsill of the apartment building from which these sounds were recorded.


"City Ambience Vol.4" includes:

  • Ambulance Siren in City Traffic
  • Car Passing by City
  • City Ambience with Helicopter
  • City Atmosphere and Jet Plane
  • City Traffic After Rain Outside Window

City Ambience Vol.4 - Sound List

This small sound pack will help create an atmosphere of busy city traffic for games and other visual content.

Recorded and mixed in WAV 96 kHz/24 bit.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 45

Number of Audio Cues: 45

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 50 min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
